name: pokemon-summon-arena-mvp
description: Pokemon Summon Arena MVP - PvP turn-based 2D game with Solana authentication

scripts.build: pnpm --filter backend run build && pnpm --filter frontend run build
scripts.start: concurrently "pnpm --filter backend run start:prod" "pnpm --filter frontend run start"
scripts.test: pnpm --filter backend run test && pnpm --filter frontend run test
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter backend run clean && pnpm --filter frontend run clean
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter backend run lint && pnpm --filter frontend run lint
scripts.format: pnpm --filter backend run format && pnpm --filter frontend run format
